caption:
I started thinking about all the moments that make this job so meaningful—the laughs, the stories, the moms sitting in our chairs trying to soak in a few minutes of peace before jumping back into the chaos.

To all the women who mother—with their whole heart, in all the ways that count—thank you. Whether you’re raising littles, loving bonus kids, guiding from afar, or showing up with a listening ear and a warm hug, you are making a difference.

We see you. We appreciate you. And today, we celebrate you! 💝

Happy Mother’s Day to the mamas, the stepmoms, the grandmas, the aunties, the mentors, and every woman who shows up with love like a mother. You deserve all the rest, all the love, and every pampered moment.

love, Erica

#mommani #ericasata #mothersday #nailtech
